EMPLOYEE: Benefit amounts mayrange from $5,000 to$20,000 in $5,000increments.
SPOUSE: Benefit amounts mayrange from $5,000 to$20,000 in $5,000increments.Amount cannot exceed100% of the employeeamount.
CHILD: Benefit amounts mayrange from $2,500 to$10,000 in $2,500increments.Amount cannot exceed50% of the employeeamount.
